snippet: No. 24 Cincinnati used a 29-5 run to defeat Seton Hall, 65-59, and Georgetown held D’Angelo Harrison to 2 points in a 68-56 win over St. John’s.
abstract: College Basketball East Men's Roundup; Cincinnati beats Seton Hall, 65-59; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: No. 24 Cincinnati used a 29-5 run to defeat Seton Hall, 65-59, and Georgetown held D’Angelo Harrison to 2 points in a 68-56 win over St. John’s.

headline.seo: Seton Hall Loses 3rd Straight; Georgetown Beats St. John’s
headline.main: Seton Hall Loses 3rd Straight; Georgetown Beats St. John’s
headline.print_headline: Seton Hall Loses 3rd Straight; Georgetown Beats St. John’s
